post.title: anyone ever try to put ur data/voice plan sim card on your rogers 3g rocket stick?
post.content: hi just wanna know if it works or not, when i put my rocket stick simcard on my bb 8900 it works fine just i dun have a voice plan with me so i get charge $1 a min if i ever place a call, but its fine when i browse the internet. so anyone try to use a data/voice plan sim card for the rogers 3g rocket stick?? i wonder if it will work the other way around...
